name: @fire-zu/billclaw
description: Bank transaction and bill data import for OpenClaw - Data sovereignty for your financial data
author: fire-zu

commands.name: bills
commands.description: Manage bank account connections and transaction imports

subcommands.name: setup
subcommands.description: Interactive setup wizard for connecting bank accounts

subcommands.name: sync
subcommands.description: Manually trigger transaction sync for all connected accounts

subcommands.name: status
subcommands.description: Show connection status and recent sync results

tools.name: plaid_sync
tools.description: Sync transactions from Plaid-connected bank accounts

accountId.description: Optional: specific account ID to sync (omits to sync all)

tools.name: gmail_fetch_bills
tools.description: Fetch and parse bills from Gmail

days.description: Number of days to look back (default: 30)

tools.name: bill_parse
tools.description: Parse bill data from various formats (PDF, CSV, email)

source.description: Source type: plaid, gmail, file, or email

data.description: Raw data or file path to parse

oauth.name: plaid
oauth.description: Plaid Link OAuth flow for connecting bank accounts

services.name: sync-service
services.description: Background service for automatic transaction synchronization

services.name: webhook-handler
services.description: HTTP endpoint for handling Plaid and Gmail webhooks
